uniques: Can trade civilization introductions for [100] Gold
Allow City States to spawn with additional units
Can convert gold to science with sliders
"Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game
[+1 Gold, +1 Production, +1 Science, +1 Food, +1 Culture, +1 Faith, +1 Happiness] per [1] population [in all cities]
Enables conversion of city production to [Gold]
Enables conversion of city production to [Science]
Enables conversion of city production to [Culture]
May buy [All] units with [Culture] for [3] times their normal Production cost
May buy [All] units with [Faith] for [3] times their normal Production cost
May buy [All] buildings with [Culture] for [3] times their normal Production cost
May buy [All] buildings with [Faith] for [3] times their normal Production cost
